jobDescription: White Glove Placement Inc is affiliated with top ranking facilities throughout New York. Our clients include hospitals, nursing homes, clinics, group homes correctional center, home health and more.  We are currently hiring Long Term Care RN Registered Nurses to help fill vacancies at our client Nursing Homes. If you have Nursing Home / Long Term Care experience, then we would love to hear from you! As a Registered Nurse RN with White Glove you will care for patients in a nursing home environment. Duties include record patient histories, perform various diagnostic tests, administer medications and develop patient care plans in conjunction with other medical professionals. Full time and part time positions8 hour shifts: days, evening and nightsSome positions for New Graduate NursesBenefits for RN Registered Nurse – Long Term Care Excellent payWeekly PayrollDirect deposit for your convenienceHealth coverageMetro CardsRefer-a-Friend bonus24 hour support by our caring teamRequirements for Long Term Care RN Registered Nurse NYS RN Registered Nurse LicenseExperience in the Nursing Home / Long Term Care as a RN Our recruiters will take you through the rest of it, guiding you in the process to complete your file so you can start this RN Registered Nurse assignment in the nursing home ASAP.
